data.title: Quick Facts about SLU LAW
data.text:
Number of students

211: 193 full time; 18 part time

Median GPA

3.5

Median LSAT score

156

75th to 25th percentile of LSAT score

160-153

75th to 25th percentile of GPA

3.73-3.21

Minority enrollment

23.7%

Gender identity

55% Female / 45.5% Male / 0.5% X

States represented, including D.C.

29

Plus the additional countries: Australia, China and Ghana

Undergraduate institutions represented

109
